name: Crypto Volatility Index
introduce: The Crypto Volatility Index (CVI) is a decentralized VIX for crypto that allows users to hedge themselves against market volatility and impermanent loss. CVI is a full-scale decentralized platform that brings the sophisticated and very popular “market fear index” to the crypto market and is created by computing a decentralized volatility index from cryptocurrency option prices, together with analyzing the market’s expectation of future volatility.
